description:
Layer up to take on changing conditions with this technical jacket. The outer face fabric behaves like a soft shell, and offers wind and water resistance. Inside, gridded fleece traps warmth, but still expels moisture. Outstanding stretch won’t limit your range of motion when you're hiking, scrambling or climbing.

  • Made of recycled polyester and spandex stretch double-weave fabric
  • Durable face is wind and water resistant thanks to a DWR finish
  • Gridded fleece is warm but breathes well so you won't overheat
  • Articulated pattern promotes range of motion
  • Handwarmer pockets are set high above a harness and have mesh liners that double as vents
  • Low-profile cuffs resist snagging
  • Drawcord adjustable hem seals in warmth
name: Patagonia R1 TechFace Jacket - Men's
